original_title: Sri Lanka bonds close unchanged, rupee 319.50/321.00 to dollar
original_body_lines: ECONOMYNEXT – Sri Lanka bonds closed unchanged at close, dealers said while the spot US dollar closed at 319.50/321.00 rupees.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2030 closed at 15.30/60.00 percent unchanged from opening.
A bond maturing on 15.01.2028 closed at 15.30/60.00 percent unchanged from opening.
A bond maturing on 15.09.2027 closed at 15.15/15.75 percent unchanged from opening.
A bond maturing on 15.05.2026 closed at 15.15/15.75 percent, unchanged from opening.
A bond maturing on 01.07.2025 closed at 15.15/15.75 percent, unchanged from opening. (Colombo/July14/2023)
